FAQ’s

Check answers to the most common questions about ChargeAutomation

What is payment automation software?

Payment automation software allows hotels and vacation rentals automatically collect reservation amount, deposit payments, outstanding balance, cancellation fee, damage deposit from most booking sources.

How will ChargeAutomation receive guest credit card?

If the reservation includes guest card, ChargeAutomation is able to obtain it from your PMS. Otherwise, a secure link will sent to the guest via email/sms to add card details

How can I send Payment Links to my customers?

You can send the link to any form of messaging communication like email, chat, SMS, or any social media sites, etc. This can be sent automatically or manually by you.

Can I limit auto payment to specific booking source?

Yes, you can customize auto payment rules by booking source type or property

Will I be notified if payment is declined?

If a payment is past due or declined, both you and the guest will receive notification via email. The guest will have the option to change payment method.

How do you handle virtual cards?

Our system can detect virtual cards and process them based on the cancellation policy of the booking source.

Will paymets collected show in our reservation software?

Yes, all payments & refunds made are reflected in your existing PMS or reservation system.

Is there a fee in using this feature?

We only charge very minimal fee in using our auto payment solution. Only successful transactions are charged for 0.15%-0.5% of the transaction amount based on the subscription tier + $0.25 cents gateway transaction fee. We bill you at the end of the month based on how many transactions are processed.

Is automated payment collection safe?

ChargeAutomation is GDPR and PCI-compliant solution. We are Stripe’s verified partner and have secured integration with various payment gateways. Automated payments collection is fully secure and reduces the risk of fraudulent chargebacks.

Can I customize payment collection rules?

Yes, you may define the payment collection schedule and rules for each booking source and property. You can set up different rules for the security (damage) deposit authorization, deposit collection, balance collection and cancellation fee refunds.
